title.rendered: Board of Education Budget Workshop on March 7

content.rendered:
The Board of Education will hold a budget workshop on March 7 at 6:30 p.m.    The meeting will be held in the MacFadden Administration Building in rooms 221-223.

Meeting agendas and minutes are posted through BoardDocs.
